snippet: The speech recognition software maker said net loss widened to 17 cents a share. Revenue rose marginally to $475.5 million.
abstract: Speech recognition software maker Nuance Communications reports third-quarter loss of $54.2 million, or 17 cents a share, compared with loss of $35 million, or 11 cents a share, in year-ago quarter; revenue rose marginally to $475.5 million.
lead_paragraph: The speech recognition software maker said net loss widened to 17 cents a share. Revenue rose marginally to $475.5 million.

headline.main: Nuance’s Loss Increases to $54 Million, as Costs Rise
